education.institution: Appa Institutes of Visvesvaraya Engineering and Technology

responsibilities: Responding to employee's mails, chats, tickets & calls on any IT related issues

Handling Active Directory user and computer tools. Managing computers & user accounts, giving permission to the user in Active Directory, adding user to Security groups, VLAN groups & managing mail distribution groups

Creating and managing user accounts, giving permission to the user in Active Directory, adding user to Security groups & VLAN groups. DHCP Server management like Reservation of IP, manually IP pick up. & Print server management
Bitlocker(MBAM) configuration, troubleshooting and management for end users
White listing MAC address using Cisco ise portal, Managing mobile Wi-Fi access & Guest Wi-Fi access using cisco portal, WebEx Meeting management &Troubleshooting VPN related issues

Installation of OS using Clone images. Creating latest Clone images. Troubleshooting operating system related issues. Management of Apple Desktops and laptops. Installation of Mac OS and Configuration
Upgrading Computer Systems based on Employee requirements, Installations and hardware equipment changes. of Linux OS and configurations, Installation of OS in VMware, Virtual box Installation

Monitor and maintain office equipment, Computer systems, Video Conferencing Devices, Printers & network devices. Managing ticketing tool, network monitoring using cisco ise, Maintaining IT Assets & Managing stock details. Managing private cloud in open nebula for internal training

userDetails.name: CHAYAPPAGOUD PATIL
skills: Installing and configuring the peripherals, components and drivers
Windows OS installation, configuration, maintenance & troubleshooting
Windows Server: DNS Server, DHCP Server, Active Directory Domain Services, Configuration of WDS, Terminal Services
Networking: IP Addressing, Topologies, OSI model, TCP/IP, Networking Devices, Transmission Media
CCNA: Router Fundamentals, Static and Default Routing, Dynamic Routing (RIP, EIGRP, OSPF), Access Control List (ACL), like standard and extended, VLAN, NAT
Linux: Installing of Linux operating system, basic commands, creating user, modifying the user account, basic network configuration
